summary: A simple facegen/morph change to the Nine Jarls of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[Size=3]REQUIRES LASTEST VERSION OF SKYRIM[/size]

[color=#CDBE70]Introduction[/color]
A facelift/facegen change to The Nine Jarls of Skyrim. Just a simple face morph. Made for personal reasons and uploaded to Skyrim to share. 


[color=#CDBE70]Installation[/color]
[color=#32CD32]NMM[/color] ready, Replace all. For manual install, download and drag data file to Skyrim directory -> Yes to all when asked to replace.


[color=#CDBE70]Required Mods[/color]  
Apachii Hair version requires main file from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]Apachii's Hairs[/url]. Vanilla version requires no additional files.

NOTE: Comparison shots are taken with the exact same mods installed, par this one.


To get The Jarls to look exactly like they do in the screenshots, see the below mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/?]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles - Underwear - Default by Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi V2.0b[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363/?]Beards by Hvergelmir[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=30411]Brows by Hvergelmir[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333]Straight hair retexture by navetsea[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29977/?]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt by Xenius[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45453/?]True Daughters of Skyrim by betterbecause[/url]

Recommended Body/face/skin combo for females:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554/?]CBBE skin texture V3 by navetsea with landing strip body patch and fuller lips with makeup patch[/url]

Other:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40216/?]Stormlord Armor by Christian Paskota[/url]
author: Amorphic87
